name: 36 Days of Type || U // Ugly John (21/36)
description: From Fandom: Ugly John was a mutant with three faces who was saved from a Sentinel in Sydney by Wolverine and Cyclops,  Later Ugly John was captured by the Wild Sentinels under command of Donald Trask III and Cassandra Nova. He was then critically injured by Wild Sentinels and killed by Cyclops to end his suffering. The typeface used is Gill Sans MT Bold.
